body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour              Virtual Tour       You don't have to come to Kotzebue, Alaska to visit the Northwest Arctic Heritage Center. Take a virtual tour of the Northwest Arctic Heritage Center from the comfort of your own home.  Â           Northwest Arctic Heritage Center Tour   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:4 minutes, 14 seconds  It doesn't matter if you call it the Northwest Arctic Heritage Center, the museum, or the visitor's center. Whatever you call it, you're going to want to watch this video showcasing the National Park Service building in Kotzebue, Alaska. In this short tour you'll listen, learn and look at what we are all about. By the end of it, you're going to want to come for visit of your own!
title: Kobuk Valley National Park: Virtual Tour
